name: Beretta 92
description: A police officer's standard issue equipment.

name: .44 Magnum
description: A rimmed, large-bore cartridge originally designed for revolvers and quickly adopted for carbines and rifles.

name: Glock 19
description: Ideal for a versatile role thanks to its reduced dimensions when compared to the standard sized option.

name: Colt M45A1
description: The M45A1 features durable Decobond™ brown coating and an M1913-spec Picatinny rail for mounting lights, lasers, and other accessories.

name: Colt M1911
description: A single-action, semi-automatic, magazine-fed, recoil-operated pistol chambered for the .45 ACP cartridge.

name: AAC Honey Badger
description: An integrally suppressed personal defense weapon based on the AR-15. It is chambered in .300 AAC Blackout and was originally produced by Advanced Armament Corporation (AAC).

name: AEK-971
description: The AEK-971 is based on previous AK rifles in internal design and layout, but features a Balanced Automatics Recoil System (BARS) that enhances the traditional Kalashnikov long stroke gas piston operating system by reducing the negative effects of recoil.

name: Colt AR-15
description: A lightweight, magazine-fed, gas-operated semi-automatic rifle. It is a semi-automatic version of the M16 rifle sold for the civilian and law enforcement markets in the United States.

name: Barrett REC7
description: An American firearm manufactured as a selective-fire fully-automatic and semi-automatic rifle by Barrett Firearms.

name: FAMAE SAF
description: A blowback-operated select-fire submachine gun, firing from a closed bolt. It is based on the Swiss SIG SG 540 assault rifle which was produced under license in Chile in the 1980s.

name: HK P30L
description: A recent HK pistol design, the P30 is a modern police and security pistol that combines function and safety.

name: Staccato P
description: The Staccato P has never failed a law enforcement department evaluation, including drop, accuracy, reliability, and endurance testing.
